To book us for your next event, call 203-751-799

Traditional Italian Pizza

Looking for a TX Pizza Truck? Let our family at Red Diamond Pizza Truck cater to your family and friends with a variety of our specialty pizzas! Specializing in traditional thin crust Italian style pizza, we use only the finest ingredients, friendliest staff and a hot wood fired oven to bring you the pizza you've been craving.

Pizza Party On Wheels

Based in Austin, Texas we will travel throughout the Hill County to bring the Italian Pizza Catering Experience to you. We use all fresh ingredients for every traditional italian pizza we make. Our pizza truck delivers a unique catering experience that includes: unlimited salad, fresh wood fire oven baked pizza, unlimited gelato and unlimited coffee.

The Freshest Ingredients

Our Pizza dough and sauce come from our very own restaurant Antonio's Pizza in Shelton CT, one of the best pizza joints in the State. Interested in having the pizza party come to you? Give your guests at your next graduation party, birthday or special event the traditional italian catering experience. Booking is simple and easy, just call 203-751-7999. We'll work out a deal just for you.
